[𓅓](𓅓)[𓐍](𓐍)[𓂜](𓂜)  

煤 méi = coal  
魅 mèi = der Dämon  
霉 méi = der [Moder](𓅐)  
没 méi = am not, have not [𓂜](𓂜)  

combined reading not certain, but obviously conceptually connected to dark, ignorant, negation, [mysteries](Musen)  

[𓐍](𓐍)[𓅓](𓅓) The reverse reading is the Egyptian '[Khem](Khem)' : black
